name: ImageAnnotatorClient
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
V1
ImageAnnotatorClient
description: Service that performs Google Cloud Vision API detection tasks over client images, such as face, landmark, logo, label, and text detection. The ImageAnnotator service returns detected entities from the images.

methods.name: annotate_image
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
V1
ImageAnnotatorClient#annotate_image
methods.description:
Annotate a single image. @param [String, IO, Hash, Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::AnnotateImageRequest] request The image to be annotated, specified as a Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::AnnotateImageRequest or Hash of the same form. In simple cases, you may instead specify a String (the URL or filename of the image) or an +IO+ (the image itself). @param [Array, Array, Array] features The features to annotate, specified as an array of Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::Feature or Hash of the same form. In simple cases, elements of the array may instead be specified as a symbol containing the feature requested. Only read if the +request+ parameter is a filename, URL, or +IO+; otherwise +features+ should be specified in the +request+. @param [Hash, Object] **kwargs Any other fields of +AnnotateImageRequest+ to intialize. Only read if the +request+ parameter is a filename, URL, or +IO+; otherwise +features+ should be specified in the +request+. @param [Google::Gax::CallOptions] options Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout, retries, etc. @return [Google::CLoud::Vision::V1::AnnotateImageResponse] The annotations for the image. @raise [Google::Gax::GaxError] if the RPC is aborted. @example require "google/cloud/vision/v1"

image_annotator_client = Google::Cloud::Vision.new
response = image_annotator_client.annotate_image(
  "path/to/image",
  features: [{ type: :FACE_DETECTION }, { type: :CROP_HINTS }]
)

methods.name: image_properties
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
V1
ImageAnnotatorClient#image_properties
methods.description: Feature methods. This “loop” is unrolled so that YARD attaches documentation correctly. Annotate a single image with the feature +image_properties+. The image to be annotated, specified as a Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::AnnotateImageRequest or Hash of the same form. In simple cases, you may instead specify a String (the URL or filename of the image) or an +IO+ (the image itself).

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

exceptions.description: if features other than +image_properties+ are requested.

params.name: credentials
params.description: Provides the means for authenticating requests made by the client. This parameter can be many types. A Google::Auth::Credentials uses a the properties of its represented keyfile for authenticating requests made by this client. A String will be treated as the path to the keyfile to be used for the construction of credentials for this client. A Hash will be treated as the contents of a keyfile to be used for the construction of credentials for this client. A GRPC::Core::Channel will be used to make calls through. A GRPC::Core::ChannelCredentials for the setting up the RPC client. The channel credentials should already be composed with a GRPC::Core::CallCredentials object. A Proc will be used as an updater_proc for the Grpc channel. The proc transforms the metadata for requests, generally, to give OAuth credentials.

params.name: scopes
params.description:
The OAuth scopes for this service. This parameter is ignored if
an updater_proc is supplied.

params.name: client_config
params.description:
A Hash for call options for each method. See
Google::Gax#construct_settings for the structure of
this data. Falls back to the default config if not specified
or the specified config is missing data points.

params.name: timeout
params.description: The default timeout, in seconds, for calls made through this client.

methods.name: batch_annotate_images
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
V1
ImageAnnotatorClient#batch_annotate_images
methods.description: Run image detection and annotation for a batch of images.

params.name: requests
params.description: Individual image annotation requests for this batch. A hash of the same form as Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::AnnotateImageRequest can also be provided.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.
